Hi there everyone! Thanks for taking the time to stop by our advertising thread! GreenValueHost is here today with some amazing offers made exclusive just for VPSBoard.com community forum members. Our OpenVZ VPS Nodes are powered with industry standard Intel Xeon E3 series servers with a minimum of 16GB DDR3 RAM and plenty of RAID Protected Disk Space available.​

These exclusive plans are not featured on our website and are only available by ordering through the links posted in this thread. In the ordering process you will be required to enter in your VPSBoard.com username to verify that you are a member of this community.​

Location: New York, USA.
